PrivacyViolationsSection.title: DeepSeek tracks, shares, and monitors your chats. Internxt protects it.
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: DeepSeek may be secure, but itâ€™s a nightmare for your privacy. Switch to Internxt AI for secure, private conversations that remain fully confidential and encrypted.

titles: Your chats can be seen by DeepSeek
descriptions: None of your chats in DeepSeek can be considered private or confidential as your chats are not encrypted. Employees, contractors, or moderators may access conversations for monitoring, moderation, training, or troubleshooting.

DeepSeek stores user data on servers in China, where companies may be required to provide information to the government without user consent. Users outside China have limited legal protection if data is accessed or misused.

Multiple countries and regulators have flagged privacy violations by DeepSeek. Italy blocked access to protect usersâ€™ data, and EU authorities have accused DeepSeek of unlawful data transfers to China in violation of GDPR.

Independent analyses have highlighted weak or outdated encryption practices, potential unencrypted data transmission, and insecure storage that could expose chats or personal information to leaks or breaches.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Why you need a private DeepSeek alternative
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: What DeepSeek demonstrates in security fails in terms of privacy. Get total security and encrypted chats with Internxt AI.

descriptions: DeepSeek stores, reviews, and uses your chats to improve its AI. With Internxt, your chats are completely private, never used for training, and cannot be accessed by anyone but you.
Without end-to-end encryption, DeepSeek conversations remain readable by systems, employees, and authorities, leaving confidential information vulnerable to access or misuse.
DeepSeek may share data with third parties such as cloud or analytics providers, enabling tracking, fingerprinting, and potential de-anonymization of users.

VersusSection.title: Internxt AI vs DeepSeek
VersusSection.description: Internxt offers unrivaled privacy and security thanks to zero-knowledge, post-quantum encryption, giving you the best protection from cyberattacks.

WhyBestAlternativeSection.title: Why Internxt is the best alternative to DeepSeek
WhyBestAlternativeSection.description: Internxt offers a comprehensive suite of products alongside its private AI to give you a secure DeepSeek alternative.

descriptions: Internxt Drive offers secure, zero-knowledge and post-quantum encrypted cloud storage with advanced sharing, versioning, NAS, and rclone support.
Internxt Antivirus is built directly into your app to protect against malware, ransomware, and spyware with full or custom scans.
Internxtâ€™s VPN encrypts your connection, blocks ads and trackers, and protects your identity while browsing online.

Available on Windows, Mac, Linux, and mobile, with WebDAV, Rclone, and NAS support for advanced users.

freePlanCard.description: Use Internxt AI for free with private encrypted conversations

faq.question: Is Internxt AI a more secure and private DeepSeek alternative?
answer: Yes, Internxt encrypts all your chats and never stores your conversations. DeepSeek does not encrypt chats and may use them to train its AI.
Internxt also includes Drive, VPN, Antivirus, Cleaner, Meet, and Mail to provide additional protection against hackers and data breaches.

faq.question: Is Internxt AI free to use?
answer: Yes, you can use Internxt AI for free without logging in or providing personal information or payment details.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Post-quantum encryption is designed to resist future quantum attacks, making it a more secure alternative to standard encryption.
Internxt uses this technology to protect your data and lifetime storage plans against future cybersecurity threats at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, and complies with GDPR and strict European privacy laws to protect your data.

faq.question: Is DeepSeek more expensive than Internxt?
answer: Internxt AI is free to use, and with your exclusive {{percentage}}% discount, all plans are cheaper while offering secure cloud storage and a complete privacy suite.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: If you need assistance, contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to help.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from your Internxt account settings or purchase additional plans and your storage will stack automatically.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express), PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna.
